info.title: Inspection Lot
info.description: In the SAP system, you process quality inspections on the basis of inspection lots. The data relating to a quality inspection is grouped into several entities. With this service it is possible, for example, to update inspection lot header data or to create inspection results and usage decisions.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, and update data relating to quality inspections using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Quality Management in Discrete Manufacturing(1E1)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1E1 " Link To BP ")
[Quality Management in Stock Handling(1MR)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1MR " Link To BP ")

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Quality Management: Inspection Lot (QM_INSPECTIONLOT)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

post.summary: Triggers the automatic valuation of an inspection point.
